# Strategy specific movement in scenario 2

```{r }
# load libs
library(data.table)
devtools::load_all()
```

Prepare data paths.

```{r}
# read paths
paths <- list.dirs("data_sim/", recursive = F)
paths <- paths[grep("rep_", paths)]

# make df
data = CJ(
  path = paths
)

# get replicate
data[, rep := as.numeric(
  stringr::str_extract_all(path, "rep_(\\d{3})") |> 
    stringr::str_extract_all("\\d{3}")
)]

# get sim type
data[, sim_type := stringr::str_extract(
  path, "obligate|facultative|foragers|random"
 ) 
]

# select obligate scenario 2
data = data[sim_type == "obligate",]

data[, regrowth := as.numeric(str_extract(path, "(0\\.\\d+)"))]
```

Read scaled movement weights from 2500 individuals in each simulation from generations 1, 10, 30, 100, and 950.

```{r}
data[, rel_pref := lapply(
  path, get_scaled_move_prefs, 
  gens = c(1, 10, 30, 100, 950), n_agents = 2500
)]

data = data[, unlist(rel_pref, recursive = F),
  by = list(sim_type, rep, regrowth)
]

# assign strategy
data[, strategy := fifelse(wt_5 > 0, "forager", "klept")]

fwrite(data, file = "data/results/data_rel_pref_sc_2.csv")
```
